project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks users multiple-choice questions, keeps track of scores, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Design the quiz structure with questions and answers
Implement user input to select answers and calculate scores
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the functions implemented
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
